programme.desc: Share the dream of talented Malaysian jazz pianist Tay Cher Siang, who has produced albums with singers & musicians of many music genres & released over twenty so far.

programme.title: Hear U Out Season 2 Ep42
programme.desc: Popular Singapore host Quan Yi Fong will delve deep into what lies behind the glamour & glitz of her 18 famous guests between savouring sweet treats & delectable food.

programme.title: The Inner Circle Ep10
programme.desc: Host Guo Liang delves into the lives of famed artists Li Nan Xing, Zoe Tay, Fann Wong & other stars as they head backstage together.

programme.title: Axian Small Town Foodcation Ep01
programme.desc: Join Jason Yeoh as he seeks out the charms of beautiful Penarik beach! Discover local heritage buildings and sample the town's famed Ikan Singgang sour soup, ikan celup tepung - and more.

programme.title: The Guardians Ep04
programme.desc: This series features inspiring stories of caregivers & volunteers in various countries. Through real-life accounts, we examine social issues & the profound significance of their work.

programme.desc: A pair of ex-convicts open a second-hand goods store, which somehow ends up as the hang out for neighbourhood folks with issues to resolve. Starring Elvin Ng, Rui En, Paige Chua & more.

programme.desc: As three men travel across Taiwan, expect world-class itineraries, the best local culture, and wining & dining, enjoyed with friends.

programme.title: Health Code S2 Ep08
programme.desc: Discover the medical secret hidden within your ears. Children who have a cold may have an ear infection. Also, learn why using cotton swabs to clear earwax can also cause infections.

programme.title: Tasteful Life S2 Ep01
programme.desc: Season 2 continues to capture the challenges and achievements of people who work in the food industry.

programme.desc: A food deliveryman who discovers his sister's dating app on her phone ends up connecting with a new love he does not foresee - within the 100-meter radius.

programme.title: The Encounter
programme.desc: After losing her job, a cheerful university student stumbles upon a mysterious cafe. Unbeknownst to her, this cafe is actually a transit zone for souls to find peace before passing on.

programme.title: Atuk Kembali Muda Ep29

programme.title: Buang Ep30

programme.title: Mingguan Wanita S2 Ep56

programme.title: Awang Batil Terakhir

programme.title: PRIMAdona Siri 3 (HD) Ep28

programme.title: Tiara: Awak Sangat Nakal Ep05

programme.title: Fan Fanatik Ep05

programme.desc: A young woman's life turns tragic after she discovers that she's adopted and then goes in search of her real mother.

programme.title: Trilogy of Swordsmanship
programme.desc: It's three times the substance, style and stars, in this amazing motion picture featuring the work of three of Shaw Brother's finest martial arts directors.

programme.desc: Asiapol agent Yang Ming Hsuan sets out to apprehend George Eaton, a high profile thug who has escaped to Hong Kong. With home support, can Yang take him down?

programme.title: The Assassin
programme.desc: Set in the Warring States period of ancient China, this drama tells the story of Nieh Cheng, one of history's greatest political assassins.

programme.title: The New Shaolin Boxers
programme.desc: Alexander Fu stars as a young carriage driver who finds love and encounters peril after he rescues a girl from being harassed by a dangerous group.

programme.title: The Shaolin Avengers
programme.desc: The story of the Shaolin Temple's betrayal by the White-Browed Hermit and Shaolin hothead Fong Sai-yuk's revenge bid gets retold again.

programme.title: The Comedy of Mismatches
programme.desc: Pat Ting Hung, Carrie Ku Mei and Li Hsiang Chun star in this delightful tale of mistaken identities caused by monogrammed handkerchiefs.

programme.title: The Silver Fox
programme.desc: Actress Lily Ho plays the feared swordswoman Silver Fox, who witnessed her father senseless maiming and her mother's rape. 18 years later, it's payback time.

programme.title: The Delinquent
programme.desc: A hothead (Wang Chung) is tempted by the dark side in this coming-of-age tale which centres on c. 1970s lower-class Hong Kong teens.

programme.title: The Tigress of Shaolin
programme.desc: Hui Ying-hung co-stars with Liu Chia-yung in this fast-paced comedy that features the outrageous Leprosy Boxing style.

programme.title: That Man in Chang-an
programme.desc: Yan Jun stars in this romantic Han dynasty adventure epic as a dying emperor alongside an evil queen, amidst plots and counterplots galore!

programme.title: The Dragon Creek
programme.desc: In one of her first roles, 'Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon' villain Cheng Pei Pei plays a kung-fu Nancy Drew who must face a secret serial killer.

programme.title: Forbidden Tales of Two Cities
programme.desc: Li Han Hsiang directs this fascinating comedy about three couples and forbidden love across Macau and Hong Kong.

programme.title: The Secret of the Dirk
programme.desc: Lovely Ching Li and handsome Chang I unite as star-and-sword-crossed comrades who take on the vicious Black Tigers gang in a quest for hidden wealth.

programme.title: Heaven Sword and Dragon Sabre 2
programme.desc: In Part 2 of this adventure, only the title weapons' union can save the 6 remaining sects which vie for mastery of the martial world.

programme.title: King Eagle
programme.desc: Ultimate combat is in the offing after King Eagle Chan Fei learns that Hung Ching Tien murdered their chief in a power struggle.

programme.title: Blue Skies
programme.desc: Cheng Pei Pei stars as Hsiao-Yun, a young singer struggling to juggle her career and her relationship with her pianist lover.

programme.title: The Crimson Charm
programme.desc: Ivy Ling Po and Chang Yi play a noble swordsman and a one-armed swordswoman who find themselves up against the evil Crimson Charm gang of thieves and thugs.

programme.title: Family Light Affair
programme.desc: Serio-comic clashes of cultures ensue when a Mainland Chinese family try to make a go of it in Hong Kong.

programme.title: The Dream of the Red Chamber
programme.desc: This epic classic charts a romance between two teenage cousins, who pursue their relationship despite objections from their respective families.

programme.title: The Knight of Knights
programme.desc: In seeking to avenge his six comrades' murders, a swordsman must battle against Qiao Qing Monastery's notorious monks.

programme.title: The Mad Monk
programme.desc: The Mad Monk rushes around saving hawkers from crumbling walls and bullies, recovering stolen money and punishing a ruthless court official and his son.

programme.title: Death Duel
programme.desc: An ace swordsman fights evil, rescues women and takes part in duels to the death.

programme.title: Let's Fall in Love
programme.desc: Pressured by his parents to marry prior to taking over his father's business, Guan rejects every girl they find but then, he stumbles upon the perfect one?

programme.title: The Proud Youth
programme.desc: This fascinating story of conflicting clans marks the beginning of Sun Chung's exploration of the kung fu genre.

programme.title: The Casino
programme.desc: After they reunite in a casino, two lovers (Lily Ho and Yueh Hua) vow to rid the place of corrupt military leaders and criminal others.

programme.title: The Sleep Curse
programme.desc: After two cult classic films from the 90s - director Herman Yau & Anthony Wong reunite, and together with Gordon Lam, Michelle Wai & Jojo Goh, challenge your limit in this paranormal thriller.

programme.title: Old Cow vs Tender Grass
programme.desc: At 49, Singaporean taxi driver Moo is still trying to find love. His life seems set to change when he meets the young, but eccentric Moon, an avid animal lover. Are they meant to be?

programme.title: Queen of Triads
programme.desc: A young innocent girl is betrayed by her loved ones & decides to take control of her life by becoming a gangster. Starring China's famed actors, Raquel Xu & Emotion Cheung.

programme.title: Push and Shove
programme.desc: Yu Feng & Liang Liang's puppy is gravely injured while defending them from their neighbour's aggressive dog but sadly, the neighbour refuses to take responsibility.

programme.title: The Trough
programme.desc: Nick Cheung wrote and directed this Hong Kong crime thriller about a prolific and accomplished undercover cop who has no qualms in risking his life to take down the leader of a mysterious criminal group.

programme.title: The Captain
programme.desc: When the windshield of an airplane shatters at 30,000 feet in the air, the pilot and the crew attempt the impossible. Based on the miraculous landing of Sichuan Airlines flight 8633.

programme.title: A Chinese Odyssey Pt 2 Cinderella
programme.desc: After Joker (Stephen Chow) goes back 500 years, he runs into a myriad of oddball characters, including the Longevity Monk.

programme.title: The Lady Improper
programme.desc: A woman is left by her husband due to her fear of intimacy. While finding her feet in her father's restaurant, she gets attracted to the new chef, a free spirit who helps liberate her.

programme.title: MMA Diva
programme.desc: When MMA Diva Xin Lan suffers a defeat to He Hua and loses her father's club, an injured Xin Lan seeks out a retired fighting legend to help reclaim her honour.

programme.title: Paws-Men
programme.desc: The Paws-Men are protectors of dogs but they encounter a host of challenges. They do, however, get to witness true friendships between dogs and humans. Starring Tats Lau, Chan Lai Wun & Bob Lam.

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon
programme.desc: This action crime drama stars Donnie Yen & Andy Lau as a drug kingpin and a corrupt policeman who team up to build an underworld empire in 1960s Hong Kong.

programme.title: Seabok
programme.desc: Former secret agent Ki Hun is entrusted with a mission to protect Seobok, the first-ever human clone who possesses a life-preserving DNA that could save humanity.

programme.title: The Yuppie Fantasia 3
programme.desc: Challenges in Leung Foon's life turn him into a chauvinist who hates himself. However, the arrival of his daughter spells a second chance at redemption.

programme.title: Who Killed Cock Robin
programme.desc: A Taiwanese crime masterpiece not to be missed! An investigation into a long-forgotten accident reveals an unimaginable dark truth.

programme.title: Somewhere Winter
programme.desc: It's 1991. A university student meets a Taiwanese photographer at a concert at Beijing Workers' Stadium and thus, begins a whirlwind romance with far-reaching implications.

programme.title: The Rookies
programme.desc: When an extreme sports enthusiast is mistaken as a triad member, he soon finds himself in Budapest alongside an agent & three other individual in a war against terrorism.

programme.title: Default
programme.desc: Based on real-life events, this story features the different happenings in South Korea during the Asian Financial Crisis. Can they overcome the biggest crisis of the country?

programme.title: Our Time Will Come
programme.desc: Directed by Ann Hui, starring Zhou Xun, Wallace Huo & Eddie Peng, this war flick with a stellar cast shines the light on true events surrounding the resistance groups' fight for independence.

programme.title: Seabok
programme.desc: Former secret agent Ki Hun is entrusted with a mission to protect Seobok, the first-ever human clone who possesses a life-preserving DNA that could save humanity.

programme.title: Sky on Fire
programme.desc: Directed by Ringo Lam, Daniel Wu stars as a security chief embroiled in a battle to protect a cure for deadly disease from falling into the wrong hands. Joseph Chang & Zhang Ruo Yun co-star.

programme.title: Two Tigers
programme.desc: An inept kidnapper has the table turned on him by the wily businessman he kidnaps, and is coerced into doing his bidding. How will the story end for the captor and the captive?

programme.title: Love Revolution
programme.desc: Shortlisted at the 9th Okinawa International Movie Festival, Sam Lee's action romance depicts a spirited woman who sets out to rescue her dope-running boyfriend, when he is kidnapped in Thailand.

programme.title: Knockout
programme.desc: After his incarceration, a former boxer learns that his wife has passed away, leaving behind a sick daughter. To get her to undergo treatment, he agrees to step into the ring again.

programme.title: Reborn
programme.desc: Programmer & gamer Li Hao Ming is drawn into a shady hacking game after he is approached by mercenaries. Now, he must figure out who's friend, who's foe - and who's behind it all.

programme.title: Summer Love Love
programme.desc: Three very different men from Hong Kong, who are desperately lonely, end up facing countless challenges when they decide to seek love in Hainan, China.

programme.title: Force of Nature
programme.desc: Disgraced cop, Cardillo, join forces with Dr. Troy and her retired detective father to battle a gang of thieves and escape before the entire city is deep underwater.

programme.title: Christmas With the Darlings
programme.desc: When an assistant gives her final notice, she is drawn into helping the charming, younger brother of her wealthy boss as he looks after his orphaned nieces and nephew through Christmas.

programme.title: Zombieland: Double Tap
programme.desc: Columbus, Tallahassee, Wichita, and Little Rock move to the American heartland as they face off against evolved zombies, fellow survivors, and the growing pains of the snarky makeshift family.

programme.title: Alvin and the Chipmunks: the Squeakquel
programme.desc: After a concert mishap, the singing chipmunks take a break from superstardom and go to school to fit in with kids their age.

programme.title: Charlotte's Web
programme.desc: After a farmer's daughter saves a baby pig from the axe, the piglet befriends a spider who spins webs of miracles to keep the pig alive.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo!: Return to Zombie Island
programme.desc: Join Scooby-Doo, Shaggy and the Mystery Inc. gang as they win a vacation of a lifetime and soon find out that paradise comes with a price when they encounter an army of zombies.

programme.title: Like a Boss
programme.desc: Two female friends with very different ideals decide to start a beauty company together. One is more practical, while the other wants to earn her fortune and live a lavish lifestyle.

programme.title: Wild Mountain Thyme
programme.desc: Two star-crossed lovers in Ireland get caught up in their family's land dispute as John Patrick Shanley, who created the classic Moonstruck, brings his sweeping romantic vision to the Emerald Isle.

programme.title: Battleship
programme.desc: An international naval coalition becomes the world's last hope for survival as they engage a hostile alien force in this epic action-adventure.

programme.title: Jack Reacher
programme.desc: A homicide investigator digs deeper into a case involving a trained military sniper who shot five random victims.

programme.title: Johnny English
programme.desc: It is up to the inept Johnny English to try and stop the archvillain who is behind the theft of the Crown Jewels that were under his watch.

programme.title: Midway
programme.desc: Based on true events in the Battle of Midway, the film tells story of the leaders and soldiers who used their instincts, fortitude, and bravery to overcome the odds during World War II.

programme.title: Who's by Your Side S1 Ep08
programme.desc: The ten-episode one-hour series explores relationship issues and marital challenges, and depicts painful dilemmas for the characters through a unique lens on their daily lives.

programme.title: Folklore S2 Ep01
programme.desc: This Asian horror anthology series features scary stories based on the deeply-rooted superstitions and folkloric myths across six Asian countries.

programme.title: Batman V Superman: Dawn of Justice
programme.desc: Amidst the war between Batman and Superman, a new threat arises, putting mankind in an unimaginably great danger.

programme.title: This Is 40
programme.desc: As a married couple hit 40, they start to reconsider some of the choices they've made.

programme.title: Atonement
programme.desc: When a young child falsely accuses a man of a crime he did not commit, it sets off a chain of events that alter the lives of her loved ones forever.

programme.title: The Client
programme.desc: Finding himself wanted by the FBI and the mob, a streetwise boy enlists the help of a lawyer to help him navigate the sea of single-minded prosecutors and protect him from the mobsters' reprisals.

programme.title: Ronin
programme.desc: In a world where loyalties are easily abandoned and allegiances can be bought, a new and deadlier terrorist threat has emerged - free agent killers!

programme.title: Succession S3 Ep05
programme.desc: Ambushed by his rebellious son Kendall at the end of Season 2, Logan Roy begins Season 3 in a perilous position, scrambling to secure familial, political, and financial alliances.

programme.title: Insecure S5 Ep04
programme.desc: The final season continues to follow our favorite characters as they evaluate their relationships, in an effort to figure out who and what comes with them in this next phase of their lives.

programme.title: Curb Your Enthusiasm S11 Ep04

programme.desc: The Browns are having their annual summer games. Will Paddington be good at any of them? // Mrs. Brown has bought an old camper van and decides to take the family on a camping holiday.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S1 Ep117
programme.desc: The town hall is leaking and needs a new roof, and Paddington must stay silent to raise the money. // Will the strange radio messages Jonathan is receiving mean visitors are arriving from another world?

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S1 Ep118
programme.desc: It's the day of the Dragon Island Duel, a one-on-one race between Blaze and Crusher around the tropical island! Crusher cheats and sends Blaze away before the race, AJ must rescue him and bring him back.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S1 Ep119
programme.desc: When Crusher cheats at a carnival game, he accidentally strands himself and Pickle on a rocket! Now it's up to Blaze and AJ to rescue them before their runaway rocket crashes into the garbage dump.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S1 Ep105
programme.desc: Santi and crew will have to team up with a pirate puppy to stop Bonnie Bones and save an old friend. // Enrique's new gold-digging machine threatens Lorelai's home.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show S1 Ep106
programme.desc: Baby and friends set out to climb Wish Mountain and make a wish on the legendary shooting starfish, Ol' Sea Breeze.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S4 Ep402
programme.desc: Learn all about manners with the Guppies, as Molly helps aspiring princess Demanda get polite in time for the Glitter Games! Will they become true princesses together?

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S5 Ep513
programme.desc: When supervillain Lady Goo Goo starts changing everyone into babies, it's up to Guppy Girl and Bubble Boy to stop her before they get turned into babies too!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep115
programme.desc: Peppa and her family go for a picnic. Daddy Pig falls asleep after eating so much, but then gets some exercise being chased by a wasp!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep116
programme.desc: Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig find a box of instruments in the attic, and Peppa and George try them out.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep117
programme.desc: Frogs and Worms and Butterflies: Peppa and George play at being pretty butterflies, wriggly worms and muddy frogs.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep118
programme.desc: Peppa and George make everyone laugh when they dress up as Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep119
programme.desc: Peppa loses her shoes, but she gets new red ones. Now she is so happy in them, that she refuses to take them off.

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep103
programme.desc: The barbababies find a lost baby elephant and secretly look after it. How will Barbapapa and Barbamama react to Boris?

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep104
programme.desc: Barbapapa wants to teach his children to make bread, but things don't go as planned...

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S2 Ep215
programme.desc: Josh and Blue are Neighborhood Heroes, helping everyone they meet as they explore our neighborhood. We play Blue's Clues to figure out where Blue wants to go and also make pizza with Mr. Oregano!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S1 Ep115
programme.desc: Blaze and his friends join the Truck Rangers, a scouting club where trucks earn badges for their achievements. But when Crusher's selfish scouting lands everyone introuble, Blaze must race to the rescue!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S5 Ep501
programme.desc: Mayor Humdinger makes fake emergencies for his kitties to save so they look better than the PAW Patrol. // The Wingnuts get a pet ostrich but it gets lost on the way home. The PAW Patrol must find it!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S5 Ep502
programme.desc: An ancient relic disappears from Carlos' dig, Tracker and Skye must find the creature that may have taken it. // Mayor Humdinger fakes a toe injury to win a race so the pups build him a mobility device.

programme.title: Deer Squad S1 Ep114
programme.desc: Steel's automated delivery drones create chaos in the city and forest. Kai has to disable the drones real quick!

programme.title: Calvin & Kaison's Play Power S1 Ep117
programme.desc: There's no wrapping paper in HQ! Luckily, ROBO G has a Mega Present Boxing Machine but it's jammed! Calvin must use his PLAY POWER to get the machine working again so he can wrap Kaison's surprise present.

programme.title: Calvin & Kaison's Play Power S1 Ep118
programme.desc: Calvin goes to Dinosaur Jungle to find a rare golden egg. But when the volcano, Mount Rumble, shakes the ground and a boulder hurtles towards Calvin, he must activate his PLAY POWER and rescue the egg.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S1 Ep107
programme.desc: Paddington is accidentally delivered inside a wardrobe to Mr. Curry's house and must get out quickly. // Paddington tries to help Judy with her geography homework and ends up being the subject of it.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S1 Ep108
programme.desc: Mr Brown has forgotten about Mrs Brown's Birthday so Paddington decides to hold a surprise party. // Judy does not like Violin lessons so she hides from Ms Potts. Paddington takes up the challenge...

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep138
programme.desc: Peppa and George are having a costume party. Peppa is a fairy princess, and George is a dinosaur. Peppa has to pick which of her friends is wearing the best costume.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep139
programme.desc: Peppa and her family go to the museum. Peppa imagines herself as a Queen in the King and Queen's room. George imagines being a big dinosaur in the Dinosaur Room.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep140
programme.desc: It is a super hot day, and all the mud puddles have dried up, so Peppa and George play in the wading pool.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep141
programme.desc: Peppa and George visit their cousin Chloe's house, where they put on a puppet show about a pig who snores a lot. Daddy Pig and Uncle Pig miss the show as they are too busy snoring.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S5 Ep503
programme.desc: It's Secret Agent Nonny's birthday, and he's on a mission to deliver mysterious messages to all of his agent friends. Turns out, they're invitations to his own surprise birthday party!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S1 Ep111
programme.desc: It's an exciting day for Magenta because she's getting glasses! We play a special game of Blue and Magenta's Clues to find out what Magenta wants to do when she gets her glasses and we get to go with her!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S1 Ep112
programme.desc: We learn about science today as we play Blue's Clues to figure out what experiment Blue wants to try.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S1 Ep118
